00001 import java.util.regex.*;
00002 
00006 public class RegexTest
00007 {
00008     public static void main(String[] args)
00009     {
00010         Pattern standardTimePattern = Pattern.compile
00011             ("((?:0?[1-9])|(?:1[0-2]))" +
00012              "(?::([0-5][0-9])(?::([0-5][0-9])(?::([0-9]{1,3}))?)?)?" +
00013              "(am|pm)?");
00014         Pattern militaryTimePattern = Pattern.compile
00015             ("((?:[01][0-9])|(?:2[0-3]))" +
00016              "(?::([0-5][0-9])(?::([0-5][0-9])(?::([0-9]{1,3}))?)?)?");
00017         for(int i = 0; i < args.length; i++)
00018         {
00019             Matcher matcher = militaryTimePattern.matcher(args[i]);
00020             System.out.println((i + 1) + ": " + args[i] + " " + 
00021                                (matcher.matches()
00022                                 ? "matches" : "doesn't match"));
00023             if(matcher.matches())
00024             {
00025                 for(int j = 1; j <= matcher.groupCount(); j++)
00026                 {
00027                     System.out.println(" " + (j + 1) + ": " +
00028                                        matcher.group(j));
00029                 }
00030             }
00031         }
00032     }
00033 }
